ADD_JUMP.description: UI-button: Add hyper jump to list of planned jumps

ANISOTROPIC_FILTERING_DESC.message: Samples the texture across multiple mip levels to produce a much clearer texture when viewed at shallow angles. Stops the textures from becoming as blurred; however, it can come at a heavy performance cost.

ARRIVAL_DATE.description: Time of arrival, used in flight log

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING.description: Used in ShipInfo view, followed by a yes/no depending on if the ship can carry atmospheric shields

ATMO_PRESS_LIMIT.description: Base external pressure limit of a ship (without atmo shield)

AUTO_ROUTE.description: Automatically find shortest jump route (measured in time) in star map

CAPACITY.description: Capacity of ship to fit more equipment

CLEAR.description: Clear an option in game settings/options menu

CLEAR_ROUTE.description: Clear a planned route of hyperjumps

COMBAT.description: Headline for kills and combat rating

COMPRESS_TEXTURES.description: graphics option in game settings menu

CONTRACT_FRAUD.description: Crime committed by intentionally breaking a contract

CRIMINAL_RECORD.description: Past crimes / crime history of character

DATE.description: Date of an event, used in flight log

DELTA_V_EMPTY.description: Delta-v capacity of a ship with no cargo or upgrades

DELTA_V_FULL.description: Delta-v capacity of a ship with maximum cargo

DELTA_V_MAX.description: Delta-v capacity of a ship with cargo bay fully loaded with propellant

DEPARTURE_DATE.description: Time of departure, used in flight log

DETAIL_DESC.message: Lägre ger bättre prestanda, på bekostnad av visuell detaljer

DISABLE_SCREENSHOT_INFO_DESC.message: Hide all displayed info, including system coordinates, when in screenshot mode (toggle HUD mode).

DISPLAY_HUD_TRAILS_DESC.message: Guides the eye by showing the trajectory of ships on the HUD

DISPLAY_NAV_TUNNELS_DESC.message: Shows a virtual tunnel to current selected target on the HUD

DISPLAY_SPEED_LINES.description: Settings option: effect when travelling in space

DISPLAY_SPEED_LINES_DESC.message: Assists the sense of direction of movement in space

DUMPING.description: The illegal act of dumping waste

EDIT.description: Tooltip, to edit a flight log entry

ENABLE_AUTOSAVE.description: Allow the game to autosave when docking

FLIGHTLOG_DOCKING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name

FLIGHTLOG_FLYING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is the name of a space body

FLIGHTLOG_HYPERSPACE.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is the star system targeted for hyperspace jump.

FLIGHTLOG_JUMPING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is the star system targeted for hyperspace jump.

FLIGHTLOG_LANDED.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position, 'primary_info' is the name of a space body, typically a planet, the other two variables are latitude and longitude as floating point number, e.g. 'Landed on Trantor, position (-43.23, 67.89)'

FLIGHTLOG_STARPORT_ORBITAL.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name, 'secondary_info' is a space body (planet, moon/satelite, star) name

FLIGHTLOG_STARPORT_SURFACE.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name, 'secondary_info' is a space body (planet, moon/satelite, star) name

FLIGHTLOG_UNDOCKING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name

FLIGHT_LOG.description: Title for flight log screen, in info view

FREE.description: Used in Ship Information view as in Capacity: 10t (5t free)

IM_TIRED_OF_WORKING_FOR_NOTHING_DONT_YOU.message: Jag är trött på att arbeta för ingenting. Vet du inte vad ett kontrakt är?

IN_SYSTEM.description: Used in flight log, show which star system we are/were in

ITEM_IS_OUT_OF_STOCK.message: Den här varan finns inte på lager.

ITS_BEEN_GREAT_WORKING_FOR_YOU_IF_YOU_NE.message: Det har varit bra att arbeta för dig. Om du behöver mig igen så kommer jag att vara här ett tag.

LAUNCH_PERMISSION_DENIED_FINED.message: Uppskjutningstillstånd nekat: du har obetalda böter.

MINIMAL_TRADE.description: Indicates a system does not have a significant amount of trade in a commodity.

MULTISAMPLING_DESC.message: A graphical fine-tuning feature, used to reduce jagged, pixelated contours. It can be quite resource-intensive.

NEXT_FACE_FEATURE.description: Face feature switch button for FaceGenerator in the PersonalInfo view

NORMA_ARM.description: Arm of the Milky Way galaxy

NOT_ENOUGH_ALLOY_TO_ATTEMPT_A_REPAIR.message: Inte tillräckligt med {alloy} för att försöka reparera

NOT_SUPPORTED_ON_THIS_SHIP.message: {equipment} stöds inte av den här skeppsmodellen

NO_VALID_ROUTE.description: Message in the sector map, issued by the autoroute function.
NO_VALID_ROUTE.message: No valid route to the selected system.

ORBITAL_ANALYSIS_NOTES.message:
Cirkulär omloppshastighet är angiven för en tangerande hastighet. Skeppet borde röras i 90° riktning mot skep/{name} axeln.

Nedstigningshastighet är ett absolut minimum och är också tangerande. En lägre hastighet eller lägre vinkel kommer att resultera i en kurs som korsar ytan på {name}.

Flykthastighet fungerar i teorin i alla riktningar så länge inte skeppet krockar med {name} på vägen.

OUTER_ARM.description: Arm of the Milky Way galaxy

OVERVIEW_NAME_FILTER.description: Filter overview window entries by name
OVERVIEW_NAME_FILTER.message: Filter overview window entries by name

OWED.description: Player owing money to crew members

PAY.description: Pay for a transaction of services, e.g. for paying fines, (or repairs)

PERSEUS_ARM.description: Arm of the Milky Way galaxy

PILOT_SEAT_IS_NOW_OCCUPIED_BY_NAME.message: Pilotens stol är nu upptagen av {name}

POSITION.description: The job title/position of crew memeber

PRESS_A_KEY_OR_CONTROLLER_BUTTON.message: Press a key or controller button or escape to clear

PREVIOUS_FACE_FEATURE.description: Face feature switch button for FaceGenerator in the PersonalInfo view

QUIT_CONFIRMATION.description: For the checkbox in settings window

REMOVE.description: Remove, e.g. deleting a log entry

REMOVE_WHEN_COMPLETED.description: For UI hyperjump planner, referring to jump target system

REQUIRED_FUEL.description: Fuel usage for traveling to star system

ROTATE_VIEW.description: Indicates that the button must be kept pressed down, to rotate camera view with mouse

SAGITTARIUS_ARM.description: Arm of the Milky Way galaxy

SCOOP_MOUNTS.description: How many slots or mounts exist on the ship for fitting SCOOPS (e.g. cargo scoop, fuel scoop, multi-scoop)

SCUTUM_CENTAURUS_ARM.description: Arm of the Milky Way galaxy

SELECT_A_FILE_TO_SAVE_TO_OR_ENTER_A_NEW_.message: Välj en fil att spara till eller skriv in ett nytt filnamn

SHIP_VIEWING_WAS_SOLD.message: Skeppet du tittade på har blivit sålt

START_AT_BARNARDS_STAR_DESC.message: This is a difficult start from the System Administration Resting prison station.

START_AT_EARTH_DESC.message: This is an easy start from London on Earth in the Sol system.

START_AT_MARS_DESC.message: This is an easy start from Cydonia on Mars in the Sol system.

START_AT_NEW_HOPE.description: New Hope is an in game location

START_AT_NEW_HOPE_DESC.message: This is a moderate start from Itzalean on New Hope in the Epsilon Eridani system.

START_LOG_ENTRY_1.description: First custom log message when starting a new game, giving backstory to the character. Importantly we here hint at what actions the player is best to take: buy fuel, get reputation, ask for take off clearance.
START_LOG_ENTRY_1.message: Unfortunately, uncle never showed me how to operate this old barge when he was alive, but I think I'm making an entry in the ship's log now. It's strange, I can still feel him, as if he's in the very walls of this ship. Maybe he can be my co-pilot, and together we will manifest our destiny in the great void. But first, I just need to buy some hydrogen for the jump drive, plot a course to lucrative trading opportunities, and pray to the heavens that traffic control will allow an inexperienced pilot like me to take off, then we'll see what this baby can do. Time to make a reputation for myself!

START_LOG_ENTRY_2.description: First custom log message when starting a new game, giving backstory to the character, here going for a Blade Runner feeling
START_LOG_ENTRY_2.message: My boots are still wet from the heavy rainfall last night, back home. The pavement got so wet it - seemingly, in an act of revenge - drenched the night sky with the reflected glow from the neon signs that looked down on the wet street. But I made it, through the rain, to my connecting flight to the starport where my new ship was waiting for me. The starport security officer gave me a funny look when I told him I'm here to pick up a ship. I guess I didn't look like the typical spacer, having sold everything I had to invest in this rusty old bucket, as I was standing in front of him, wet boots and all. But I truly feel, that from now on, my future will be written in the stars. Now, I just need to find the start-key.

START_LOG_ENTRY_3.description: First custom log message when starting a new game, giving backstory to the character. Here explaining why there's no hyperdrive in the ship, and what to do about it.
START_LOG_ENTRY_3.message: After a long bureaucratic process, I finally got my ship back from the impound, but they had stripped her down to the bare metal, to pay 'the debt' they claimed I had. Not only did they take my favourite coffee brewer, but those bastards also ripped out the hyper drive, so I'm stuck for now in this system, unless I sell whatever is left in the ship, to finance a new drive. But as they say: when life gives you lemons - make lemonade; so even if I'm back at square one, I will think of this as an opportunity instead of as a setback, a second chance. Without coffee. By letting go of what I am, I will become what I might be. The world will turn aside, and let me pass, as it does for those who know where they are going, and I am heading to the stars.

STATION.description: Flight log info, will refer to a station by name

STATION_DOCKS.description: Information shown in the station lobby, for total number of docking pads
STATION_DOCKS.message: Our total capacity is {total_docking_pads} docking pads.

STATION_LOCAL_GRAVITY_PRESSURE.message: Local gravity here is %.2f g, and atmospheric pressure is %.2f atm.

STATION_ORBIT.description: Information shown in the station loby
STATION_ORBIT.message: Vi är i en {orbit_period} dags period runt {parent_body}.

STATION_TECH_TOO_LOW.message: Station tech level too low to sell this item

TECH_CERTIFIED.description: Lobby screen shows the tech level (an integer number) of the station

TECH_CERTIFIED_MILITARY.description: Lobby screen shows the tech level of the station
TECH_CERTIFIED_MILITARY.message: Denna station är certifierad för militär utrustning.

TEXTURE_COMPRESSION.message: This frees up more memory for the graphics card, which is likely what you want, at the expense of compressing them during game start.

THANKS_AND_REMEMBER_TO_BUY_FUEL.message: Tack för ditt köp. Kom ihåg att utrusta och köpa bränsle innan du åker.

THERE_IS_NOBODY_ELSE_ON_BOARD_ABLE_TO_FL.message: Det finns ingen annan ombord som kan flyga skeppet.

THE_SHIP_IS_UNDER_STATION_CONTROL_COMMAN.message: Skeppet är under stationens kontroll kapten.

THIS_IS_FACTION_POLICE.description: Greeting message in police station. 'faction' is one of (English, non-translatable) strings: 'Solar Federation', 'Commonwealth of Independent Worlds', or 'Haber Corporation', and 'faction_police' is one of: 'SolFed Police Force', 'Confederal Police' or, 'Haber Enforcement Division'

TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_SHOW_STATIONS.message: Toggle showing stations in the overview
